example.eg: Robert turned on the tap and let the water run into the sink.
example.egtrans: 罗伯特把水龙头打开，让水流进水槽内。

example.eg: Linda heard a tap at the window and looked up to see the postman with a parcel for her.
example.egtrans: 琳达听到有人在轻扣窗户，于是抬起头，看见邮递员拿着给她的包裹。

example.eg: Jim felt Peter's tap on his shoulder and turned to see what he wanted.
example.egtrans: 吉姆感觉到彼得轻轻拍了一下自己的肩膀，便转头去看他想要干什么。

example.eg: Jessica tapped the door before going in.
example.egtrans: 进门之前，洁西卡轻轻叩击了门。

example.eg: Harry went up to Catherine and tapped her on the shoulder.  Beth tapped the icon for the app she wanted to open on her phone screen.
example.egtrans: 哈利赶上凯瑟琳，轻轻拍了一下她的肩膀。贝丝轻击手机屏幕上应用程序的图标，点开自己想要的程序。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 轻敲, 轻叩, 轻拍, 轻击

example.eg: Beth tapped the icon for the app she wanted to open on her phone screen.
example.egtrans: 贝丝点击手机屏幕上的应用图标，打开了应用。

example.eg: The secretary was tapping the keys.

dsense.name: tap [sth]
dsense.guideword: (music: mark beats with foot, etc.) (随着音乐)

example.eg: The music started and soon everyone was tapping their feet.
example.egtrans: 音乐响起，每个人都用脚轻轻地打拍子。

example.eg: The barman poured a pint from the tap.
example.egtrans: 酒保从龙头那儿打了一品脱啤酒。

dsense.name: tap
dsense.guideword: informal, abbreviation (bug, wiretap) (对电话、电报的)

example.eg: Caroline suspected someone had a tap on her phone.
example.egtrans: 卡洛琳怀疑有人在她的电话上安装窃听装置。

example.eg: Jason used a tap to cut the threads in the nut.
example.egtrans: 杰森用螺丝攻在螺帽内切割螺纹。

example.eg: Stephen does both ballet and tap.
example.egtrans: 史蒂芬会跳芭蕾舞和踢踏舞。

dsense.name: taps
dsense.guideword: mainly US (nighttime bugle signal in camp)

example.eg: At taps, all the lights were extinguished.
example.egtrans: 熄灯号响起后，所有灯都熄灭了。

example.eg: Senior figures in the party have tapped the young senator as a possible future president.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 任命, 指定, 选定

example.eg: The manager wanted to tap his team's potential.
The tree surgeon tapped the trunk of the big maple.

dsense.name: tap [sth]
dsense.guideword: (draw liquid by opening faucet) (打开旋塞)

example.eg: The Smith family tap their water from a natural spring.
Julie tapped a piece of metal to make a nut.
Adrian suspected someone was tapping his calls.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 搭线窃听, 给...装窃听器

example.eg: The mine owner was pleased to hear the workers were tapping a new vein.
example.egtrans: 矿主很高兴能听到矿工们正在开发新的矿脉。

example.eg: The teenager tapped her mother for £20.
Paula wished she could tap into Rachel's enthusiasm.
example.egtrans: 宝拉希望她能够利用蕾切尔的满腔热情。

example.eg: George tapped out an email to his boss.
The drummer tapped out the rhythm.
The pub has a good range of beers on tap.
The auto parts store always keeps a selection of fan belts on tap.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 常备的, 可随时取用的

dsense.name: be on tap for [sth]
dsense.guideword: US, figurative, informal (scheduled to take place)

example.eg: A spinal tap is a delicate and painful medical procedure.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 脊椎穿刺, 抽脊椎液

example.eg: He jumped up on the table and did a tap dance.
My daughter learned to tap-dance at school.
The tap dancer's performance was mesmerising.
My daughter's always enjoyed tap dancing.
I think someone might have tapped my phone – it's making a funny noise.
Would you like bottled water or tap water?
example.egtrans: 你是想要瓶装水还是自来水？
